com.radiusnetworks.ibeacon
Interface RangeNotifier

public interface RangeNotifier

This interface is implemented by classes that receive iBeacon ranging notifications

See Also:
IBeaconManager.setRangeNotifier(RangeNotifier notifier), IBeaconManager.startRangingBeaconsInRegion(Region region), Region, IBeacon

Method Summary
 void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons, Region region)
          Called once per second to give an estimate of the distance to visible iBeacons
 

Method Detail

didRangeBeaconsInRegion

void didRangeBeaconsInRegion(java.util.Collection<IBeacon> iBeacons,
                             Region region)
Called once per second to give an estimate of the distance to visible iBeacons

Parameters:
iBeacons - a collection of IBeacon objects that have been seen in the past second
region - the Region object that defines the criteria for the ranged iBeacons
